name: African American Natural Beauty: Blonde Bombshell T Shirt
description:
For the Naturalistas who like to make bold moves and march to the beat of a different, more daring drummer--- here's a stunning depiction of a stylishly blonde fro'd out sistah, lookin' fly--- naturally. The hair color may not be natural to her but the style definitely is!
Available in Bella short sleeve ringer tee, Bella 3/4 sleeve raglan tees & ALO half zip pullover hoodies.
CAN ALSO BE PRINTED AS JUMBO PRINT THAT WOULD COVER THE ENTIRE FRONT OF THE TEE WITH OR WITHOUT BACKGROUND. ADDITIONAL CHARGES APPLY.

NOTE: Watermarks will NOT appear on final product.

$5 Flat Rate Shipping On All Items.


---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

sleeves and neckline

100% polyester birdseye knit jacquard
Dry wicking capabilities draw moisture away, keeping you cool and comfortable
Added anti-microbial treatment prevents the increase of bacteria and
keeps clothes odor free
Reversed YKK zipper at center front with contrast tab
Hidden key pocket at wearer's left with contrast bartacks at stress points
Contrast coverstitching at shoulders, hood, key pocket, sleeves and bottom hem
Underarm gussets for extra mobility and comfort
Contrast facing at sleeves and bottom hem
Drop tail for added coverage

Prices are for design on Alo Ladie's Pullover Front ONLY. If customer desires print on both front & back there will be additional charges. Convo with me 1st before ordering if you wish to have graphic on both front & back.

name: Old School Female Hip Hop Throwback T Shirt
description:
T Shirt featuring artwork of Old School Rap B-Girl listening to headphones hooked up to huge boombox. Reminiscent of the 'Golden Age' of Hip Hop when B-Girls were as masterful with the lyrical flow as the B-Boys; were just as plentiful on the scene and could hold their own in the company of ANY male emcee. We reminisce, we reminisce...

name: Nappy & Natural Hair Pride T Shirt 'Take That Up Wit' God' with simple quote
description:
Ever wanted to speak to people who seem to have a problem with our hair in it's natural state? Well, I made a tee for ya..like to see it? Here it go: Quote: "If you have an issue with the natural, curl, nap or kink of my hair, take that up with GOD. I'm sure HE is anxiously awaiting your critique. Then again, HE probably don't give a damn what you think either." (There are 2 versions of this design. If you have a preference for one in particular, please note it when ordering.)

name: Divine Spirals T Shirt
description:
Celebrate the Divine Inspiration of our crown! Features a quote of Dr. Suzar Epps from the book, Blacked Out Through Whitewash---The 'Spiral' is the movement of Creation. The Spiral, especially the Golden Spiral, is the most profound motion in the universe. At the same time, it is the most profound design in the universe built into all lifeforms. The power that causes galaxies to spiral, stars, planets and atoms to spin; that causes the double helix spiral of the DNA molecule; this same spiraling power causes spiraling hair--otherwise known as NAPPY, KINKY, CURLY, CRINKLY, BUSHY, FRIZZY, WAVY, WOOLLY HAIR!!!!

NOTE: Watermarks will NOT appear on final product.
